name: super-rod
effect: Used to find Pokémon on the Super Rod list for an area, which are generally the best available there.
short_effect: Used to catch Pokémon in bodies of water.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
The best fishing
rod for catching
wild POKéMON.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
The best fishing
rod for catching
wild POKéMON.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
An awesome, high-tech fishing rod.
Use it by any body of water to fish
for wild POKéMON.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:

Use it by any body of water to fish for
wild aquatic Pokémon.
